div.head: Identification and expansion of abbreviations understood by the editor
div.p: Identification and expansion of abbreviations understood by the editor

NOTE: Abbreviated phrases (e.g., D(is) M(anibus)) should be marked-up word-by-word, thus: abbr expan="Dis"D/abbrabbr expan="Manibus"M/abbr rather than as a whole phrase (abbr expan="Dis Manibus"DM/abbr). We are using the abbr tag to mark abbreviated words, not acronyms or otherwise abbreviated phrases. If an application needs to be able to identify and expand acronyms and abbreviated phrases, it will need to do so by processing the text to aggregate sequences of abbr-tagged words.
TEI P4: abbr; 6.4.5 Abbreviations and Their Expansions
